game.name: Road to Empress I
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 내 선택이 모두의 운명을 결정하는 시네마틱 인터랙티브 궁중 어드벤처 게임! 수많은 분기 스토리와 극악 사망률의 도전에서 살아남아 정점에 오를 수 있을까요? 성세천하: 여제의 탄생 I이 당신을 스릴 넘치는 궁중 암투의 여정으로 초대합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You've never played a game like this before. Road to Empress I is a cinematic palace adventure where your choices decide everyone's fate. Tackle multiple story branches and a high mortality rate with charm, wisdom and courage? First...survive.

reviewHighlights.text: The experience was enjoyable, and the production quality and UI design is really incredible for a game under 7 euros. However, I find it hard to recom...
